#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define M 1000000007
long long int po[35];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;long long int p,q,as=4;bool flag=false;
	po[0]=1;
		for(int i=1;i<=30;++i)
		{
			po[i]=po[i-1]*2;
			
		}
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		flag=false;
		cin>>p;cin>>q;int g=__gcd(p,q);p/=g;q/=g;
	    	for(int i=0;i<=30;++i) for(int j=0;j<=30;++j) 
			if(((po[i]-1)*p*po[j])==(q*po[i])) {flag=true;break;}
		if(flag) cout<<"YES\n";
		else     cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
